content: in a legal case that lasted for 2 years and 1 month the harju county court made a final decision on 14102021 the details of the case are not mentioned but the court ruled that one party is responsible for covering the procedural costs the court dismissed some claims and counterclaims and divided the joint assets between the parties the apartment will be owned solely by one party while the other party will receive financial compensation the joint loan obligation will be left to both parties with one party ordered to pay a specific amount to the other the court also dismissed claims regarding alleged loans and gifts and ordered the return of certain items the court considered the compensations and offsets the mutual claims the court also ordered one party to give consent to change the ownership of the apartment the decision can be appealed within 30 days the court based its decision on the family law act and the law of property act the court determined the value of the apartment and the loan obligations the court also resolved a dispute regarding a car lease balance and the division of joint funds the court ordered compensations and transfers of funds between the parties the court dismissed some claims and rejected others due to lack of evidence the court emphasized the protection of property rights as a result the court ordered the transfer of apartment ownership financial compensations and the division of the joint loan obligation the court also dismissed certain claims and ordered the return of items the court considered the offset of obligations and determined the final compensation the court ordered one party to give consent for the other party to become the sole owner of the apartment the decision on procedural costs was reserved
